Review_Text: Shame so much energy goes towards hate and division... let's turn back time to a time when people get stoned for adultery... slavery is part of every day life... men controlled women.... so sad.

Steven Anderson and others put on this horrible piece of propaganda that just hates on gay people. Its vile, bigoted and twisted. Who in this day and age still thinks like this. these people have issues that need to be worked out.

Review_title: disgusting and awful on every level.
Review_Text: This film is not a loving celebration of Christianity but of some kind of perverted ideology not better than National Socialism. The swastika substituted by a cross. Jesus would twist and turn in his grave (if there was one)

Review_title: So glad I'm not a Christian anymore.
Review_Text: Stupid people gonna stupid. Seriously, it's the people who made and participated in the making of this excrement that convince me our species will not last much longer. In such a work, it's not about acting, production values, or content; it's about decency. This movie. It has none. The funny and sad thing is that the word excrement might cause this review to be rejected. The actual excrement will doubtlessly be just fine.If the people who made this movie were in charge, we'd still be at the banging rocks together stage of development. The one bright spot is this: at least I can feel morally and intellectually superior. There's that.

I am very grateful for this documentary!!! Please people of God open your eyes about this deceptive matter, before you fall victim of the intentions of these vile wicked dogs. They know no boundaries, I promise!!! I hope and pray this helps many,many people!!
Our society has become deceived and this documentary clearly preaches the truth. The truth is hate to those that hate the truth.
One of the best New IFB Documentaries out there. I'm really thankful for Pastors in America who preach against sodomy. Keep up the good work, Stedfast
